item.title: 加拿大科技公司首席执行官敦促在投票前就经济问题展开 "真正的辩论
item.description: 加拿大科技界领袖呼吁，下周各政党领袖在台上讨论各自观点时，应就国家的经济未来展开 "真正的辩论"。【原文：Canadian technology leaders are calling for a “real debate” about the country’s economic future when party leaders discuss their views on stage next week.】

item.title: 特朗普动摇世界秩序，加拿大养老金瞄准欧洲
item.description: 加拿大最大的养老基金近年来增持了美国资产，以利用强劲的经济增长。现在，唐纳德-特朗普总统的议程让一些人将欧洲视为吸引资金的地方。【原文：Canada’s biggest pension funds increased their ownership of US assets in recent years to tap into strong economic growth. President Donald Trump’s agenda now has some eyeing Europe as an attractive spot for capital.】

item.title: 年度最佳电子游戏《蓝色王子》背后的八年历程
item.description:
这款难以解释的益智游戏可能会成为史上最优秀的游戏之一

。【原文：

A puzzle game that defies easy explanation may go down as one of the finest ever made

】

item.title: 每日拍卖会上的黄金竞拍热潮推动黄金价格飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 每日拍卖会上的抢购活动推动了黄金价格最近一次刷新纪录；这一迹象表明，即使在黄金价格创下历史新高的情况下，市场上的主要参与者仍在增持黄金。【原文：Gold’s latest surge to fresh records has been fueled by a rush of buying activity in daily auctions — a sign that major players in the market are still adding to their holdings even at all-time high prices.】

item.title: 萨尔茨吉特结束与 GP、TSR 财团的收购谈判
item.description: 德国萨尔茨吉特钢铁公司（Salzgitter AG）结束了与 GP Günter Papenburg AG 和 TSR Recycling GmbH & Co.【原文：German steelmaker Salzgitter AG ended talks with a consortium of GP Günter Papenburg AG and TSR Recycling GmbH & Co. regarding a potential takeover offer.】

item.title: 花旗称关税将颠覆中美乙烷和丙烷贸易
item.description: 据花旗集团称，中美关税之争将扰乱乙烷和丙烷市场，有可能颠覆近年来随着塑料制造业发展而急剧增长的贸易。【原文：The US-China tariff battle is set to disrupt ethane and propane markets, according to Citigroup Inc., threatening to upend a trade that has surged in recent years as plastics manufacturing ramps up.】

item.title: 安哥拉动用 2 亿美元满足摩根大通贷款保证金要求
item.description: 安哥拉称，本周早些时候，在这个产油国的美元债券随原油价格下滑之后，它使用了约2亿美元作为摩根大通公司10亿美元贷款的额外抵押。【原文：Angola said it used about $200 million as additional collateral for a $1 billion loan from JPMorgan Chase & Co. after the oil-producing nation’s dollar bonds slumped along with crude prices earlier this week.】

item.title: 法国称科技是美国关税对策的一个可能组成部分
item.description: 法国财政部长埃里克-隆巴（Eric Lombard）说，针对美国科技公司的关税只是对唐纳德-特朗普可能采取的应对措施之一，目前尚未决定。【原文：France’s finance minister, Eric Lombard, said that targeting US tech firms is just one element of a possible response to Donald Trump’s tariffs that is not yet decided.】

item.title: 美国关系变差，欧盟竞相扩大价值 2 万亿欧元的贸易网络
item.description: 由于官员们担心跨大西洋关系已遭到不可逆转的破坏，欧盟正在争分夺秒地与世界各国达成贸易协议，努力摆脱保护主义日益严重的美国，实现多元化发展。【原文：The European Union is racing to clinch trade deals with countries around the world in an effort to diversify away from an increasingly protectionist US as officials worry that the transatlantic relationship has been irreversibly damaged.】

item.title: 纽约西村顶层公寓以创纪录的 8750 万美元挂牌上市
item.description: 在曼哈顿一条铺满鹅卵石的街道上，一个正在开发的项目的顶层公寓以 8,750 万美元的价格挂牌，创下了第 14 街以南地区的最高纪录。【原文：A penthouse at a project under development on a cobblestoned Manhattan street is getting listed for $87.5 million, a record-high price for the area south of 14th Street.】

item.title: 摩根大通称美国消费者状况良好，经济衰退风险加剧
item.description: 据美国最大的银行称，美国消费者的消费状况良好，至少目前如此。【原文：The US consumer is doing OK — at least for now, according to America’s biggest bank.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税试验让美国人对价格感到不安
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普在 "解放日 "宣布征收关税，掀起了他第二个任期内最动荡的一段时期，金融市场陷入混乱，中国采取报复措施，而美国总统在一些征税措施生效仅几小时后就暂停了征税。【原文：Donald Trump’s “Liberation Day” tariff announcement set off the most volatile stretch of his second term, with financial markets descending into chaos, China unleashing retaliatory measures and the US president pausing some levies only hours after they took effect.】

item.title: 约翰-米勒认为 2025 年小额贷款供应量将在调整后突破历史记录
item.description: 资深市政债券投资人约翰-米勒（John Miller）认为，即使全球贸易战震撼了股票和债券市场，通常平静的市政债券市场也会在今年再创佳绩。【原文：Veteran municipal bond investor John Miller is calling for another banner year for new borrowings from state and local governments, even after the global trade war that’s rocking stocks and bonds ripped through the usually placid muni market.】

item.title: 贸易战为需要中国点头的 Ansys-Synopsys 交易敲响警钟
item.description: 中美之间不断升级的关税之争正在为全球最大的未决交易之一蒙上阴影，交易商们越来越担心，中国政府的反垄断监管机构将使收购陷入困境。【原文：The escalating tariff fight between the US and China is casting a shadow over one of the world’s biggest pending deals, and traders are growing fearful that the takeover will get bogged down by Beijing’s antitrust regulators.】

item.title: ION 计划聘用意大利资深间谍，大力推进安全工作
item.description: ION 集团的 Andrea Pignataro 正计划聘用一名意大利前高级间谍，以加强公司的金融安全服务。【原文：ION Group’s Andrea Pignataro is planning to hire one of Italy’s former top spies in a bid to boost the company’s offering of financial security services.】

item.title: 新山公司募集 30 亿美元基金用于保持真实化学
item.description: 据知情人士透露，新山资本公司（New Mountain Capital）已从投资者手中筹集了约 30 亿美元的资金，用于收购 Real Chemistry 公司，这是有史以来最大的单笔资产交易之一。【原文：New Mountain Capital has raised about $3 billion of equity from investors for a continuation vehicle that’ll house Real Chemistry, in one of the biggest-ever such deals for a single asset, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 爱尔兰监管机构将就人工智能工具 Grok 的数据使用问题调查马斯克的 X 公司
item.description: 爱尔兰数据监督机构已对埃隆-马斯克的社交媒体平台 X 进行调查，调查内容涉及该平台为训练其人工智能模型 Grok 而处理欧洲用户的帖子。【原文：Ireland’s data watchdog has launched an inquiry into Elon Musk’s social media platform X over the processing of European users’ posts for the purpose of training its AI model, Grok.】

item.title: 比尔-阿克曼抨击三杠杆 ETF 和零日期权热潮
item.description: 比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）瞄准了日间交易者钟爱的两个蓬勃发展的市场：高杠杆交易所交易基金和零日股票合约已成为华尔街最热门的期权策略之一。【原文：Bill Ackman is taking aim at two booming markets beloved by day traders: Highly-leveraged exchange-traded funds and zero-day stock contracts that have become one of the hottest options strategies on Wall Street.】

item.title: 特朗普关税冲击后，世界工厂中心陷入恐慌
item.description:
最贫穷国家的出口商正在努力应对订单被取消、生计被破坏以及不知道下一步该怎么办的困境。【原文：

Exporters in the poorest countries are grappling with cancelled orders, upended livelihoods and the impossibility of knowing what to do next.

】

item.title: 美联储威廉姆斯下调经济增长预期，上调通胀预期
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）表示，由于美国的关税政策和移民减少，他预计经济增长将放缓，失业率将上升，通胀率将回升。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said he expects slower economic growth, higher unemployment and a pickup in inflation due to US tariffs policy and reduced immigration.】

item.title: 波兰称资本市场应从私人储蓄中获得推动力
item.description: 波兰央行行长亚当-格拉平斯基（Adam Glapinski）表示，欧洲的家庭应该得到激励，将他们的部分储蓄转移到促进资本市场发展的地方。【原文：Households in Europe should get incentives to move some of their savings to boost capital markets, Poland’s central bank Governor Adam Glapinski said.】

item.title: 英国国家巴黎银行因政治和关税战下调南非经济增长预期
item.description: 由于国内政治的不确定性和美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税战，法国巴黎银行下调了南非的经济增长率。【原文：BNP Paribas slashed its economic growth for South Africa because of domestic political uncertainty and US President Donald Trump’s tariff war.】

item.title: 德州仪器、英特尔因中国关税打击美国产芯片而下挫
item.description: 周五，在中国宣布针对半导体进口征收新关税后，在美国设有生产工厂的芯片制造商股价下跌。【原文：Shares of chipmakers with US manufacturing plants fell Friday after China announced new tariffs, targeting semiconductor imports.】

item.title: 赖特称美国可削减伊朗石油供应并帮助填补缺口
item.description: 美国能源部长克里斯-赖特（Chris Wright）表示，美国的制裁措施可将伊朗的石油出口量削减至目前水平的四分之一，而全球供应商中的页岩油生产商将帮助填补这一缺口。【原文：US sanctions can slash Iran’s oil exports to a quarter of current levels, with shale producers among global suppliers that would help fill the gap, Energy Secretary Chris Wright said.】

item.title: Wi-Fi巨头TP-Link在美国的未来取决于其宣称与中国的分离
item.description: Wi-Fi 路由器无处不在，却常常被忽视，它是华盛顿最大的国家安全难题之一的核心，也是太平洋两岸两兄弟之间的裂痕。【原文：The ubiquitous but often overlooked Wi-Fi router lies at the heart of one of Washington’s biggest national security dilemmas — and a rift between two brothers on opposite sides of the Pacific.】

item.title: 特朗普的贸易战让美国农民对需求风险忧心忡忡
item.description: 乔希-约德（Josh Yoder）是俄亥俄州的第五代农民，随着唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）本周大幅升级对华贸易战，他一直在关注农作物市场的动向。约德仍然是特朗普的忠实支持者，但他也开始担心总统的策略是否会奏效。【原文：Josh Yoder, a fifth-generation farmer in Ohio, has been watching gyrations in the crop markets as Donald Trump moved to dramatically escalate his trade war with China this week. Yoder is still an ardent Trump supporter, but he’s also getting nervous about whether the president’s strategy is going to pay off.】

item.title: 关税升级导致中国航空公司推迟交付波音飞机
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国吉祥航空有限公司正在推迟交付一架波音公司的宽体飞机，这凸显了华盛顿和中国政府之间不断升级的贸易战如何推高了大宗商品的价格。【原文：China’s Juneyao Airlines Co. is delaying delivery of a Boeing Co. widebody aircraft, according to people familiar with the matter, highlighting how the escalating trade war between Washington and Beijing is driving up the price of big-ticket goods.】

item.title: 鳕鱼角一位立法者说，"欢乐时光 "禁令不好玩，必须终止
item.description: 马萨诸塞州是仅有的几个禁止餐馆提供欢乐时光特饮来吸引顾客的州之一。州参议员朱利安-赛尔（Julian Cyr）正在努力改变这一现状。【原文：Massachusetts is one of only a handful of states that prohibits restaurants from offering happy hour drink specials to lure in customers. State Senator Julian Cyr is on a mission to change that.】

item.title: 美联储穆萨莱姆释放通胀加剧、就业市场疲软的风险信号
item.description: 圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆说，近期存在通胀上升而劳动力市场疲软的风险，这要求决策者在监测新数据时保持警惕。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President Alberto Musalem said there’s a near-term risk that inflation will rise while the labor market weakens, requiring policymakers be vigilant as they monitor the incoming data.】

item.title: 物价预期飙升，美国消费者信心指数延续跌势
item.description: 美国消费者情绪跌至近三年来的最低点，而短期和长期通胀预期则因关税担忧加剧而飙升至数十年来的高点。【原文：US consumer sentiment tumbled to an almost three-year low while short- and long-term inflation expectations soared to multi-decade highs on growing tariff concerns.】
